dm:document.description: X-GOOGLE vendor extension for video pipeline monitoring.

object.name: STBService.{i}.X_CATAWAMPUS-ORG_ProgramMetadata.
object.description: Information on the programs available on the STB

parameter.name: MulticastPackets
parameter.description: Number of EPG multicast packets received.

parameter.name: LastReceivedTime
parameter.description: Timestamp of last EPG multicast packet received.

parameter.name: EPGExpireTime
parameter.description: Timestamp of end of current EPG database.

parameter.name: EPGErrors
parameter.description: Number of errors during EPG processing.

parameter.name: X_CATAWAMPUS-ORG_StallAlarmTime
parameter.description: Initial time at which {{param|X_CATAWAMPUS-ORG_StallAlarmValue}} was encountered. This value is only set the first time the alarm is seen and not changed until the next reset. The Unknown Time value, as defined in {{bibref|TR-106a2}}, indicates that an alarm has not been encountered since the last reset.

parameter.name: X_CATAWAMPUS-ORG_StallAlarmValue
parameter.description: Threshold for {{param|X_CATAWAMPUS-ORG_StallAlarmTime}}, in {{units}}. If a MainStream instance goes this long without receiving data, {{param|X_CATAWAMPUS-ORG_StallAlarmTime}} will be set.

object.name: STBService.{i}.ServiceMonitoring.MainStream.{i}.Total.X_CATAWAMPUS-ORG_MulticastStats.
object.description: Total IP Multicast statistics for this ''ServiceMonitoring'' main stream instance.

parameter.name: MulticastGroup
parameter.description: The Multicast IP group (if any) associated with this MainStream.

parameter.name: StallTime
parameter.description: The amount of time since data last arrived, in {{units}}}. Note that for efficiency, this value is generally snapshotted. It won't be seen to continuously increase.

parameter.name: StartupLatency
parameter.description: The time from when the application joined the multicast group until the first data arrived, in {{units}}.

parameter.name: BPS
parameter.description: The traffic received from this stream in bits per second.

parameter.name: X_CATAWAMPUS-ORG_BytesSent
parameter.description: Total number of bytes sent for this AV stream.

parameter.name: X_CATAWAMPUS-ORG_Cwnd
parameter.description: Current congestion window, in units of the MSS.

parameter.name: X_CATAWAMPUS-ORG_SlowStartThreshold
parameter.description: Current slow start threshold, in units of the MSS.

parameter.name: X_CATAWAMPUS-ORG_Unacked
parameter.description: Current number of TCP segments outstanding, which have been sent but not acknowledged.

parameter.name: X_CATAWAMPUS-ORG_Sacked
parameter.description: Current number of TCP segments for which a selective acknowledgement has been received, but are awaiting retransmission of an earlier frame before being delivered.

parameter.name: X_CATAWAMPUS-ORG_Lost
parameter.description: Current estimate by the sender of the number of frames which were lost before reaching the receiver.

parameter.name: X_CATAWAMPUS-ORG_Rtt
parameter.description: Current estimate of round trip time to this destination.

parameter.name: X_CATAWAMPUS-ORG_RttVariance
parameter.description: Expected variance in RTT. A measured ound trip between RTT +/- RTTVariance is considered normal. Outside of this range will trigger TCP to recompute its parameters for this connection.

parameter.name: X_CATAWAMPUS-ORG_ReceiveRTT
parameter.description: Receiver's notion of the round trip time from the sender.

parameter.name: X_CATAWAMPUS-ORG_ReceiveSpace
parameter.description: Current space remaining in bytes in the TCP receive queue.

parameter.name: X_CATAWAMPUS-ORG_RetransmitTimeout
parameter.description: Timeout before retransmission?

parameter.name: X_GOOGLE-COM_NegotiationCount4
parameter.description: Number of times the HDMI/HDCP connection has renegotiated in the last 4 hours.

parameter.name: X_GOOGLE-COM_NegotiationCount24
parameter.description: Number of times the HDMI/HDCP connection has renegotiated in the last 24 hours.

parameter.name: X_GOOGLE-COM_VendorId
parameter.description: Short identifier of the vendor which manufactured this DisplayDevice.

parameter.name: X_GOOGLE-COM_ProductId
parameter.description: Short identifier of the model name of this DisplayDevice.

parameter.name: X_GOOGLE-COM_MfgYear
parameter.description: Year this DisplayDevice was manfactured (for example: 2008).

parameter.name: X_GOOGLE-COM_LastUpdateTimestamp
parameter.description: Time the HDMI connection was last initialized.

parameter.name: X_GOOGLE-COM_EDIDExtensions
parameter.description: Vendor extensions to the E-EDID retrieved from the connected HDMI device.
